website_summaries.verdict: Between its high-end display, variety of ports, and included car charging port, this portable DVD player provides ultimate road trip entertainment.
pros: Compatible with PCs, gaming consoles, streaming devices, and other devices
cons: Its 5-hour battery life is decent, but it recharges quickly

customer_reviews.title: This portable DVD player is just great. The sound is fantastic and the picture is ...
customer_reviews.text: This portable DVD player is just great. The sound is fantastic and the picture is very good. I bought it so I could let my mother watch Shirley Temple DVD's. She has hearing aids and even with those she can hear the sound pretty well. I use ear buds sometimes when there is a lot of noise in the home. I love it that the movie starts where you left off. I would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy K.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with this DVD player
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this DVD player. Easy to operate, great sound and picture! Love having a bigger screen and it is so nice having all the accessories that came with it. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: carol Z.

customer_reviews.title: Good Player
customer_reviews.text: This player met my expectations. Very bright and clear picture. The speakers are also fairly loud for a portable player. Only downside is it's a little expensive, but I would rather spend the cash on this player than a cheaper one and sacrifice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Park

customer_reviews.title: Versatile DVD
customer_reviews.text: I like this DVD machine very much. The screen is large enough and it swivels, making it very versatile. I like to watch DVDs while I walk on the treadmill, and while the screen is great, the sound is not as loud as I'd like it to be. I bought decent headphones, and I'm hoping that will make the machine perfect. When not on the treadmill, I found the sound just right.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Susie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I'm knocking off a star for the remotes. There are two and I can't figure them out much less make them work adequately, its a hit and miss even after changing the batteries on both of them, even though they come with new batteries in them. I think it works brilliantly and I love the larger screen! You don't exactly need the remotes there are buttons on the platform. Good picture, looks nice, love that it swivels.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Travel
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. This device is extremely lightweight making it easy to hold in your lap when in the car, and with the neoprene carry case is easy to port around. The picture is great, although the sound is a little "tinny." The swiveling screen allows us to place the device almost anywhere and still see the picture. The remote sensor is under the front surface so just make sure the remote is held slightly downward and pointed directly at the sensor, Overall very pleased with the quality and ease of operation.
customer_reviews.author: Columbia, MD

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Portable DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: This DVD player is very easy to use, and has all the features anyone could want for the usual, everyday use. Pros: Very easy to figure out how to use it, and the instructions are completely clear. The screen size makes it easy to enjoy the videos. Recharging is quick. Cons: The sound is just o.k., but then, it’s not meant to be an expensive stereo system. The plastic shell seems a little cheap, but it also keeps the weight of the unit very light, and easily portable. Overall, I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend it to anyone who wants a very good quality portable DVD player.

customer_reviews.title: You can't do better
customer_reviews.text: Upon initial purchase the item was defective but customer service was superb and without any hassle they quickly sentna replacement that arrived less than a week after contacting. Pros: great customer service! Large screen, light weight, great sound and picture, 2 remotes (one for just DVD operation and the other for TV use)...I could go on Con: Can't connect Ipod for play...that's the only con I can actually come up.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger F.

customer_reviews.title: Player With the Best Features
customer_reviews.text: We just opened and used this for the first time last night. The picture is clear, and the sound is great. It is easy to use and with the 12" screen we can see it quite well. The remote control is very convenient. We had been looking for a player for a while. I am glad we chose this model.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Portable DVD player
customer_reviews.text: Wow,,,awesome quality DVD player. Great for travel. The seller also sent us a attachment to secure to back of car seat. Comes with wall charger and car charger, and a really nice bag for storage. Battery life last a long time (a plus) Grandchildren love the huge screen! Awesome seller to work with!
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great Solution!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have kids who crave entertainment, you should have this DVD player. It's little and goes everywhere--airplanes, cars, camping trips, boats, your basement. It's a straightforward player of discs with good sound, and it takes earbuds. If your kids are seeking to borrow your iPhone or monopolize the desktop--get this! It's not expensive, and they can watch movies while you surf the web. Plus--you can control their screen content by limiting it to movies that you want them to see. And, heck, you can sneak it to the bedroom to lull you to sleep. Can't live without it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good player but a challenge to remove the DVD once inside.
customer_reviews.text: I have just begun to use this player. The packaging it came wrapped in was excellent for protection. It played well and the sound was good. The reason for 4 stars is that removal of the CD /DVD from its position is difficult. I have never had a player that was so challenging to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Conscious Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very good DVD player
customer_reviews.text: A very good DVD player. Picture is very good sound is excellent remote control is easy and simple to use. I especially like it because the screen is nice and large. The only thing I'm disappointed in is that it doesn't play Blu-Ray disks. I just wish I had check that out before I purchased it. But other than that I would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The screen is good quality and crisp-easy to see. Good sound also which I need since I have some hearing loss. Great variety of accessories. Even has a remote control.
customer_reviews.author: savedbygrace

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy So Far
customer_reviews.text: Excellent performance so far. Clear picture, good sound quality with adequtate volume (prefer listening with headphones), easy controls, and the included storage case are all pluses. Purchased for long distance air travel with its 5 hour battery life. Will update if battery life or any other performance iissues come up during upcoming transcontinental trips.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Grether

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: We really like the DVD player. It has a long lasting battery so it is very nice to use on a long flight. We are of the baby boom generation so it took us a bit to figure out how to turn on the DVD, however once we figured it out it was very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: J Morgando

customer_reviews.title: Simple to Use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a family member who likes to watch movies in bed and is very pleased with the unit. It is light enough and doesn't get overly warm. It has a nice long plug in cord, large buttons and easy to read directions. Screen is a nice size. Really liked the zipper storage case that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: clvmprofesora

customer_reviews.title: Great light player, good price. Wish for slightly bigger case.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great DVD player at a very good price. Great (under-rated) feature - it can charge and play simultaneously. Only wish the case were bigger, so AC and car charger would fit along with 3-5 DVDs in their cases. We got three to fit, but the case looked stretched to bursting at zipper. Case is made of very stretchy neoprene (material like a wetsuit).
customer_reviews.author: Amy P

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this DVD player
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this DVD player. I purchased it to play my exercise videos. The sound clear and the picture is great. I have been using it for my Simply Fit Board workout. I also take it to work and let others watch and listen to music videos, I love the remote and carry case,
customer_reviews.author: Jane E. Russ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Delivered in a timely manner. Product works great. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Great little DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: screen is clear (good image), sound is very good, like the swivel feature that lets you see from different angles!
customer_reviews.author: h.uncamun.ca

customer_reviews.title: Nice DVD player.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. We had a problem with the first one but it was exchanged and the 2nd one works well.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst quality high dollar  product I have ever purchased in my 50 year living
customer_reviews.text: 1st issue was they SEND A USED PRODUCT. 2nd issue is that ever part on this felt like it would break the first week I used it. The plastic was so thin that this thing could hardly support itself. If this was a $40 item I would expect this for $175 . NO WAY HOSE!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Customer Care from Shindro
customer_reviews.text: The customer care at Shinto is incredible. Inpurcased the unit because of their customer care. I had one DVD player that did not charge and they replaced it with Very few questions asked the new player screen is clear and I have added an external speaker. The new unit seems to be really sweet for a cozy night of DVD watching
customer_reviews.author: cathy lentz

customer_reviews.title: I love this portable DVD player
customer_reviews.text: I love this portable DVD player! Sound is much better than the one I had previously and I especially like the "last memory" feature. Excellent picture, easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Pam P.

customer_reviews.title: High quality device
customer_reviews.text: High quality device. Love the HDMI In for phone screen mirroring, large USB capability, plus DVD. We’re using this for exercise videos and outdoor movies, and the large screen is wonderful. The customer service is also very helpful - you can tell this company stands behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mommy

customer_reviews.title: So happy with the size of the screen
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter who is having to spend some time in the hospital and needed a new DVD player. So happy with the size of the screen, the quality of the picture and the sound . Easy to hear without the earphones and with the swivel screen makes it so easy to set on the hospital tray so she can see it. It has brought her hours of enjoyment while having to go through procedures at the hospital. So happy with our purchase. Only one small thing I was surprised at how lightweight the unit is but hasn't been a problem and is certainly easier to carry. I would recommend this to others for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great screen. Great picture. It plays amazing. I'm really impressed with this player
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Great DVD player
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. Use it while on my treadmill and for yoga videos.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia Jane Reut

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Took this on a long vacation and it did great. Was able to entertain the kid for a while but did need to recharge sooner than expected. The functionality is great though and we love that the screen flips and rotates.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tioseco

customer_reviews.title: Column and picture quality!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of the screen. Great quality for the picture. The last portable DVD player I had the volume was so low I had a problem hearing but not with this player. Also love the case and remote!! Would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: sharon pritzker

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great feel, high quality construction, great picture colors and resolution, great sound out of the two speakers. I previously left a comment that the picture was stretched, but that was my bad. I hadn't gone in to the system setup menu, which was easy sneezy with the remote and the directions on page 9 of the owner's manual. So far, I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: I was most skeptical about tge sound...well its phenomenal. Clear and loud. The picture seems too light but I just received the player abd maybe there's a control to adjust the picture. Overall a nice product. I haven't tried the remote yet.
customer_reviews.author: chriscar

customer_reviews.title: Very nice portable DVD player.
customer_reviews.text: More than met my expectations. Easy to use for all the Great Courses that I watch. Sound is good and I can even listen without my hearing aids. Love this item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Machine!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, just what I was looking for. Great viewing area, clear picture, seems very well made, easy to run, lots of useful features. Nice bag to carry it in and has a remote control...all great features. Overall, excellent machine!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela K.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I buy it sooner.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this for when we travel, and I love it. Everything works great and was packaged real well. My brother is now wanting one.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Disselbrett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Portable DVD player
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Ordered it because of lack of electricity and was not able to see TV due to major hit of hurricane Maria in Puerto Rico. The screen size is much bigger than average portable DVD players. The price was very reasonable. Would recommend the product to any person that would be on the go and would like to see DVD while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: hramir03@sprynet.com

customer_reviews.title: Plays well!!
customer_reviews.text: I have not had any issues with this player. The volume compared to other brands is pretty good. I like the larger screen. I replaced my Panasonic 9 inch player because of features this player has.
customer_reviews.author: James Garrett

customer_reviews.title: I love the larger screen and it is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love the larger screen and it is easy to use. The case is perfect for what I wanted. It works well
customer_reviews.author: Wolfie

customer_reviews.title: Good clean picture!
customer_reviews.text: We really like this player. It is easy to use. We bought it for our granddaughter to use on long trips. It's a life saver! The picture is nice and clear. We would highly recommend this player.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great portable DVD unit
customer_reviews.text: Slick fashionable design which looks well-made. Hope it will hold up a long time. Swivel is a great feature. Like that it has a car charging plug since I plan to use it on the road. Impressive size and picture: good screen clarity! Its aspect ratio flexibility is excellent and was a key concern in choosing a unit. Wish it had HDMI output port though.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher K

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this portable DVD excellent screen picture, sound and perfect size. Bought this for my Special Needs son and he can see it perfectly. Great to take when we have long waits at doctor appointments. Def recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with it so far. The whirring sound when its playing is a little louder than others we've had but movie volume & screen image are great!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good unit for the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s rather obvious what I use this product for, watching DVDs, you could do better than this DVD player but you will have to spend more money. You get what you pay for. That being said this is a good buy for the money. At first I didn’t like the picture but you go to the picture adjustment screen and make adjustments and there’s improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Alphonse

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great unit! My husband is really enjoying using it. The product is good quality - well made and the case is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Borowka

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a surprisingly good DVD player!
customer_reviews.text: We use this player mostly in our workout room, but plan to take it to our cabin..where we have no TV.
customer_reviews.author: mommola

customer_reviews.title: arrived fast
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and sound. Fully charged it lasted 3 and half hours . Loved the gift of headphones the company also sent. Would love another set but cant find them.....
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L.Jennings

customer_reviews.title: This portable DVD player is the one you want!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 grandchildren an it's the perfect travel companion the picture quality and sound way exceed our expectations. This unit is what every parent or grand parent should have if you have children/grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P Knothe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great DVD player! The quality of the product is outstanding. Enjoying watching movies on this DVD player.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: I like the big screen wish it could fold in half and open up i use it for my office room and for travel
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great player!
customer_reviews.text: We have really been enjoying this DVD player. The picture quality and sound are great. We bought it for our 3 yr old to use in the car but she doesn't want to put it down while in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted. Had been looking for a portable DVD player for quite a while and finally decided on this one. Works great, easy to figure out, screen is adequate size and gives good quality picture. Overall am very pleased with this DVD player.
customer_reviews.author: Kookibakr

customer_reviews.title: Everything I hoped for and even better!
customer_reviews.text: This item is lightweight, has great sound and clear picture. I love I can watch while it's charging. On certain DVD's, the picture stretches out, but there is a setting for correcting that!! So happy with it and the 5 hour charge it holds. So glad I got this one!! I had questions and customer service was incredible with practically zero hold time. This is a purchase I am so glad I made!! It's compact, light and open the box and ready to go! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Shalisa D. Neely

customer_reviews.title: the sound quality is excellent and very little noise vibration for a portable player
customer_reviews.text: the sound quality is excellent and very little noise vibration for a portable player. I like the feeling of dimension within the picture. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: theresa sparboe

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good picture. Light weight and big screen. Plugs for car, home and tv hookup. The only downside is the sound is canney.
customer_reviews.author: Reffie

customer_reviews.title: The speakers are NOT loud enough.
customer_reviews.text: If you use another speaker you can get more sound. What were they thinking????? You have to be on top of it to hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected. The volume is loud and clear. Impressed with the purchase. Would purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Andes Mom

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Well, it just didn't turn on. Luckily Amazon is processing the return. Do yourself a favor and don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: it works great and looks good
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the 10" player first but the screen seemed a little for my purpose so i exchanged it for the 12", it works great and looks good, thank you for the easy exchange and fast delivery Mark
customer_reviews.author: Mark Muso

customer_reviews.title: It’s not Bluetooth compatible
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the grandson. We have been able to use our DVD player in the home. We bought this for and airplane trip in June. Can’t wait to use it as we travel loving it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: The best portable DVD player ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent portable DVD player. The picture quality is outstanding. Easy to use, easy to remove dics. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelie Romo

customer_reviews.title: Quality product with good features.
customer_reviews.text: Screen is very clear, impressed. Sound volume is adequate, will be using earbuds most of the time anyway. Remote is well laid out and easy to use. Really like the memory feature as a movie can be paused - turn off power. Then at a later time, power on the player and pick up right where you left off.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: It is heavy
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is good, and it played dvd's well, but you need a solid surface for it to play well.
customer_reviews.author: JonL

customer_reviews.title: Naviskauto DVD
customer_reviews.text: Its been working for more than a year. I love the quality of the picture. Its nice to be able to use the USB and not have to carry DVDs around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Device stopped charging within 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought with 2 year warranty and company never responded to phone calls or emails after device stopped charging. Will NEVER buy Naviskauto again. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Kunz

customer_reviews.title: Nice DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: This DVD player has a nice picture and the size is a plus !
customer_reviews.author: sandra l thibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasts a long time. I used it on the airplane and in the car. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R.

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and the remotes are great
customer_reviews.text: The screen is impressively large and clear. The battery held up through the entire dvd. My daughter was able to carry it in her back pack without weighing her down. It is easy to use and the remotes are great :-) I also purchased thel headset plug that can add 4 others to listen which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Product was as advertised and any issues I had were addressed immediately by customer rep Liva - very happy with their service!!
customer_reviews.author: Castorp

customer_reviews.title: Sound and picture
customer_reviews.text: bough at May/2020, now only July can’t even use that product, un-quality material, sound and picture not clear, thought will try little bit longer, but now not even work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this little jewell
customer_reviews.text: Love this little jewell.Sits on my lap, put on my headphones, I'm in it. Really great company. I would highly recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use, super light weight, and have a great picture. My four year old can operate hers all by herself. They've saved my sanity on a few long road trips and I'm so glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Dean

customer_reviews.title: Adapter cord stopped working and melted
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a year ago and works pretty well but adapter plug started to not charge til it melted the charging cord and now the machine is unusable. I tried calling the company and they said they don't sell just the cord. UPDATE /The company has agreed to send me a replacement dvd player and I am waiting but I had to post a revised review before they would send it to me. I will keep you posted. In the end they refused to send me a replacement
customer_reviews.author: LuWan Murphy-Visocky

customer_reviews.title: Grand kids like it
customer_reviews.text: Great for my grand kids they really like it. The battery lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: dennis w seabold

customer_reviews.title: Superb product
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used the product enough to comment on the battery life but we can say that the product delivers what it advertises. It looks great and produces a clear picture.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyP

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Just received and won’t power up. Extremely poor instructions. Suspect many false reviews on this. Tired of cheap foreign junk. It is going back ASAP. Avoid buying.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: The Best Portable DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I am so happy with this purchase. The picture is crystal clear and the sound is great! It may cost a bit more but let me tell you it is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Brown

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up for battery power, sound & pic quality
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent portable player. It's intuitive to operate, sounds better than my old one from Sony, and didn't exhaust battery power after 90 minutes like the terrible Maximus player I wasted money on last year. I watched for about 3 hours straight during a recent flight, and it still had plenty of juice left when the pilot announced our initial descent.
customer_reviews.author: Bellidan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very poor image quality, non-intuitive button layout, low volume, poor sound quality, sharp plastic case edges. A solid piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: anonymouse

customer_reviews.title: love the large screen
customer_reviews.text: love the large screen. very happy with the movie quality. Shipped well and on time. Hoping this will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: jessica pedroso

customer_reviews.title: I returned this product because I was very disappointed with it overall
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product because I was very disappointed with it overall. I plugged it into my TV and all I got was a very bad black & white picture. Couldn't get it to read anything using a usb flash drive. I just didn't like anything about it.
customer_reviews.author: TexasEnglishman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with the player, but the volume could be greater.
customer_reviews.author: Kae Bell

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent portable dvd player with many high-tech features and great sound. The company's service is terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the larger screen and the handy case that comes with it. Enjoying thoroughly!
customer_reviews.author: Tim and Beth King

customer_reviews.title: pretty nice dvd player
customer_reviews.text: I like this dvd player. It's build is a little cheap feeling but other than that, it is pretty darn good. The battery easily lasts the length of a movie and then some. The screen is big and clear. The built in speakers are not bad for a small player. It is a little tricky to get discs out of the disc compartment but that is a minor flaw in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: crb77

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom and she loved it. It’s easy to use and the swivel screen is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Akashajr

customer_reviews.title: Nice Replacement!
customer_reviews.text: The bigger screen is really nice compared to my old 9" one. Also the sound seems to be a little better than my old Panasonic as well. The only thing I'm not sure about is that is seems a little flimsier than my old one, that may be becasue my old one was about 10 years old though. So far though really happy though and the price was really good for the product received. Really like the carrying case and accessories!
customer_reviews.author: Miller247

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this dvd player the screen is clear and sound is great. Thank you for such a good product
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my player it is everything I wanted. Would surely do business again with them,thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an external speaker to enhance the poor sound and volume. The four stars are after speaker installed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this DVD player. It fit all my needs: plays DVDs from regions 0-8, has a 5-hour battery life, is light-weight, has a relatively large screen size, and comes complete with all the needed accessories such as remote controls, adapters, and a carrying case. The sound is good, but I wish the volume were a little louder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The company promptly replaced it with a new player and I am quite pleased with the replacement
customer_reviews.text: The original product was returned due to it not playing a DVD in its entirety. The company promptly replaced it with a new player and I am quite pleased with the replacement. The screen resolution is impressive and the ease of use is outstanding. Also, the customer service department was outstanding to deal with and made the replacement process seamless and efficient. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a portable player. Again, the customer service department went out of their way to make sure that I was 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Easy to figure out and use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to figure out and use. Great time on charge battery and great feature to remember the last cd where play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice one!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and nice carry bag that comes with it!
customer_reviews.author: dror

customer_reviews.title: Good little unit!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this for my husband to replace an old stereo system that never worked. This is a great little unit, does what it is supposed to do and easy for him to figure out and operate. Dvd's have a great quality, as long as they are not real old movies that were transferred to dvd. The audio isn't the best, quite tinny, but will buy a good speaker and that should help. Overall it's a good unit for the inexpensive price.I just hooked up a pair of Bose Companion III Series speakers and it sound great, what an improvement in the sound.
customer_reviews.author: K. benford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and she could not be happier with the picture, sound and overall quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But I gave it 4 instead of 5 because I was disappointed that I couldn't go from a wide screen viewing ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. I chose this one for the larger screen and longer battery life plus the other customer reviews were mostly positive. But I gave it 4 instead of 5 because I was disappointed that I couldn't go from a wide screen viewing with the black bands to a full screen. Using the settings only made the bands wider. And it makes the picture smaller on the top and bottom by a couple of inches; still in all you forget about it once you're into the video. Picture and sound are fine to me. The battery lasts at least 4 hours on a charge...haven't tried to push it to 5 or 6. Good enough player for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl T.

customer_reviews.title: A good quality product
customer_reviews.text: A good quality product. I did not give it five stars because I only used it twice and I don't know yet on it's reliability over time.
customer_reviews.author: David J Kapus

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: The player stopped reading the DVD in less than four months. Just after the return date for Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Ok dvd
customer_reviews.text: This flip open DVD player has an dark color when observing on the side of it. It seems so dark that it disables you to see darker images instead original picture..
customer_reviews.author: Willie C.

product_meta.title: NAVISKAUTO 16 inch Portable DVD Player with Large Screen Carrying Bag Rechargeable Support HDMI Input, 1080P MP4 Video, Sync Screen, Last Memory, AV in & Out, Region Free
feature_bullets: 【Built-in 5000mAh Rechargeable Battery】Last longer, greatly increase portability. With car charger and ac adapter, this dvd player portable can be used at home, car, airplane, hotel, outdoor, indoor, anytime anywhere.

【HDMI Input】Sync up to 1080P video and audio from your Computer, Mobile Phone, Raspberry Pi, Xbox, PS3, PS4, Firestick or Kindle Fire etc. Support AV IN and AV OUT function. (NOTE: The phone and the HDMI cable are NOT included.) With a FREE Carrying Bag.
【Support 1080P Video Formats】MKV/MP4/FLV/MPEG/MPG/VOB/RMVB/RM/AVI/MOV/DAT/DIVX. Built-in USB/TF card slot (up to 128GB, FAT32 format).
【1366*768 Large 16 Inch Screen】Louder dual speaker, clearer sound quality. Rotation/flip screen allow you to watch a movie or cartoon clearly from each angle, give you better visual experience.
【18 Months Warranty】Portable DVD Player with Large Screen, Remote Control, AV Cable, Wall Charger, Cigarette Charger, User Manual and 100% Customer Service.
